title: ranked game error
body: i am currently in a promotion games from bronze to siliver. The thing is that i got eligible for the promotion and after i only lost a single game but in my profile it says i lost 2 games.. how can i fix this?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and *Lew* is correct, you dodged a match during your promo series, which counted as a *loss* in your series and ended the promotional series for you. Find more about how Queue Dodging works in our [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).

Let me know if you have any questions.
It sounds like you dodged a game, whenever you dodge a game in a promo series it counts as a automatic loss.
